name: Telegram to Create Calendar Event - Home User

parameters.text:
‚ùå **Failed to Create Calendar Event!**

üö® **Error:** {{$('Parse Create Event Command').item.json.error || $('Create Calendar Event').item.json.error || 'Unknown error occurred'}}

üìã **Correct Format:**
`/create_event Title | Date Time | Duration | Location | Description`

üóìÔ∏è **Date/Time Examples:**
‚Ä¢ `2024-01-15 14:30` (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM)
‚Ä¢ `today 2pm` (natural language)
‚Ä¢ `tomorrow 3pm` (natural language)

‚è±Ô∏è **Duration Examples:**
‚Ä¢ `60` (minutes)
‚Ä¢ `1 hour`
‚Ä¢ `30 minutes`

üìç **Full Example:**
`/create_event Team Meeting | today 2pm | 1 hour | Conference Room A | Weekly standup discussion`

üí° **Tips:**
‚Ä¢ Only Title and Date/Time are required
‚Ä¢ Use pipes (|) to separate fields
‚Ä¢ Events cannot be created in the past
‚Ä¢ All times use America/New_York timezone

üîí **Security:** Only authorized users can create events
üîß **Support:** Check Google Calendar API permissions if issues persist
